entry.title: LaithMahdi/example_hono_drizzle_orm_supabase: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.
entry.content: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.

entry.title: Ip-Tec/ContactSync: ContactSync is a lightweight mobile app designed to help small businesses easily manage and synchronize their contacts. By providing a straightforward interface and efficient contact management, ContactSync aims to simplify your workflow.
entry.content: ContactSync is a lightweight mobile app designed to help small businesses easily manage and synchronize their contacts. By providing a straightforward interface and efficient contact management, ContactSync aims to simplify your workflow.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: giovannifdipasquale/weather_fetch: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times
entry.content: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times

entry.title: emberjs/data: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.
entry.content: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.

entry.title: Yigaue/oh-ok: Ohok (pronounced "oh-okay") is a lightweight and customizable text editor widget designed for web applications. It is easy to integrate and highly extensible.
entry.content: Ohok (pronounced "oh-okay") is a lightweight and customizable text editor widget designed for web applications. It is easy to integrate and highly extensible.

entry.title: lemosjs/github-webhook-manager: A lightweight Express server that automates deployments via GitHub webhooks. Pulls latest changes and restarts PM2 processes. Supports multiple PM2 instances through query parameters.
entry.content: A lightweight Express server that automates deployments via GitHub webhooks. Pulls latest changes and restarts PM2 processes. Supports multiple PM2 instances through query parameters.

entry.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
entry.content: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
